Improvements.Improvement: Refactor repetitive code into a separate method
Improvements.Description: The `createBeanDefinition` and `createBeanReference` methods are called multiple times with similar parameters. This repetitive code can be refactored into a separate method to improve readability and reduce redundancy.

The current code doesn't have any exception handling. If an exception occurs while creating or adding a bean definition, the program may crash. Therefore, it's recommended to use try-with-resources for handling potential exceptions.
